title: Loop and print with conditionals and mod

content.question: int k = 0; while (k < 10) { System.out.print((k % 3) + " "); if ((k % 3) == 0) k = k + 2; else k++; } What is printed as a result of executing the code segment?

skill.text: 3.A: Determine the result or output based on statement execution order in an algorithm.
